author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEPRESSION NEARING TROPICAL STORM STRENGTH... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH EXTENDED EASTWARD...
summary: ...DEPRESSION NEARING TROPICAL STORM STRENGTH... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH EXTENDED EASTWARD... As of 5:00 AM EDT Sat Jul 05 the center of Three was located near 30.8, -78.6 with movement NNE at 2 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1010 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...DEPRESSION NEARING TROPICAL STORM STRENGTH... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH EXTENDED EASTWARD... As of 5:00 AM EDT Sat Jul 05 the center of Three was located near 30.8, -78.6 with movement NNE at 2 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1010 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Three (AT3/AL032025)
